group_1.textRight: Oh good, I'm glad you woke up...

group_1.textLeft: Mifuyu...? What happened?

group_1.textRight: The doctor seems to think you were under@too much stress.

group_1.textLeft: Is that...so...?

group_1.textRight: The doppelganger you were talking about...
It was your twin sister...
Who would've expected both twins would@collapse at the same time...

group_1.textLeft: That was a misunderstanding...
We merely share a similar name and face...

group_1.textRight: No, you really are twins.

group_1.textLeft: What makes you so certain?

group_1.textRight: The pediatrician who was just in here said@he remembers you both.

group_1.textLeft: The doctor remembers us?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
You were the first pair of newborn twins@he had as his patients.

group_1.narration: He said that you two left an impression@because you took hold of each other's hands@moments after being born...

group_1.textRight: He also said that he heard from another@doctor that your last name was changed.
He seemed very concerned.

group_1.textLeft: Is that...so?

group_1.narration: I took Tsukasa's hand...@Moments after my own birth...

group_1.textLeft: (I accepted her immediately after coming@into the world...)
(And yet...)
(I became infuriated by the most foolish,@insignificant details...)
(I wish to shed all of my pointless@inhibitions.)
(Return to a blank slate and try again...)

group_1.textRight: I'm going to make a quick phone call.
Tsukuyo...

group_1.textLeft: Tsukasa...

group_1.textRight: I heard...
We really are twins after all.

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: Hey, Tsukuyo... Can we just throw@everything away?

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Our houses, our upbringing, everything.
Let's just wipe the slate clean and support@each other again.
Because I'm sure our families will work us to@death if we don't...

group_1.textLeft: Yes... That is also my desire.
To go back to before the shrine bestowed@our names and start anew...
Return to our true selves, who we were at@birth, holding hands.
I wish to start from that point...
(The fact I could open up to her alone,@and that my heart has found solace...)
(Both must be because we are twins alone@in this world together...)

group_1.textRight: Would you be willing to be my big sister@once again?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
Would you agree to once again become my@younger sister?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textCenter: Love overcoming class and upbringing?@That's just a delusion...

group_1.textLeft: However, no matter how earnest our oath...
We may come to hate one another once@again someday.
Should that happen...

group_1.textRight: My heart won't be able to stand the pain@a second time...

group_1.narration: Just as my mother's words were echoing@through my mind, that's when he appeared.

group_1.textCenter: In that case, why don't you make that oath@come true as a wish?

group_1.narration: That is why we made our wish.@"To never again hate the other."

group_1.textLeft: Thus concludes the series of events that@led to our wish.

group_1.textRight: Feels like so long ago, doesn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed.
I must say, it was quite a surprise to come@home to...

group_1.textRight: Hmm... So that's it, then...
I'm leaving.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][chara:101901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Did you find our tale unsatisfactory?!

group_1.textRight: Please forgive us for letting the Uwasa fall!

group_1.textCenter: I'm not going to do anything to you.
I liked your story. It inspired me.

group_1.textRight: Whew, that's a relief...

group_1.textLeft: It certainly is...

group_1.textCenter: We should also take our leave.

group_1.textRight: Yes.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Tsukasa.

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Why don't we play our flutes at the shrine@on our way home, for old times' sake?

group_1.textRight: Sounds great! Let's do it!

group_1.narration: It's so very familiar, warm, and dear.@It always has been since we met.
Playing together, the sound dancing@on the breeze... It warms my heart.
Oh sound, where does your journey take you?
To my sister, far off in the distance.

group_1.textCenter: We only have each other. Tsukasa and I shall@always be together.
